Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Basics of Motivational and Learning Psychology

Messages.Author: Aysun Dogmus
Messages.Content: In this seminar we will approach the phenomena of motivation and learning from the perspective of critical pedagogy. To this end, we will undertake both theoretical and biographical explorations.  At the centre of our theoretical explorations we will look at approaches by bell hooks, Paul Freire and Gayatri Chakravorty Spivak in particular. Our own learning biographies will be at the centre of our biographical explorations. This should enable a reflexive approach to our learning experiences and conditions of learning with reference to moments of motivation. In addition, reflecting on these experiences and conditions should sharpen our view of the design of teaching/learning settings.
